entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023
